text: Budarino () is a rural locality (a selo) and the administrative center of Budarinsky Selsoviet, Limansky District, Astrakhan Oblast, Russia. The population was 591 as of 2010. There are 11 streets. == Geography == It is located 120 km from Astrakhan, 23 km from Liman. == References == Category:Rural localities in Limansky District
title: Budarino
